text: Félix Antoine Tshisekedi Tshilombo (born 13 June 1963) is a Congolese politician. He is the leader of the Union for Democracy and Social Progress, the oldest and largest opposition party of the Democratic Republic of the Congo. On December 30, 2018 he was elected the President of the DRC. From 2021 to 2022, he was the 19th Chairperson of the African Union. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Current national leaders Category:People from Kinshasa Category:African Union chairpersons
title: Félix Tshisekedi
